team.title: Are you a team and want to be coached?
team.ol1: Go to the team management page.
team.ol2: At the bottom of the page, enter your coach’s Discord username (both of you must support EBP).
team.ol3: Done! Your coach now has read and write access to your strats and stats.

coach.title: Are you a coach?
coach.ol1: Once a team adds you as a coach, you’ll receive a confirmation email.
coach.ol2: From there, you can use the popup in the bottom right to switch the team you work on.

404.title: Not found
404.p1: Unfortunately, you have found a 404 page - page not found.
404.p2: You may have chosen the wrong address, or the page has been deleted or moved. Please check the address in your browser and change the form again.
404.p3: If the problem persists, please contact me so I can help you find the information you need.

chromium.title: Chromium Extension
chromium.p1: Boost your game analysis with the EBP Chromium extension!
chromium.p2: Export your EVA games to Excel with one click, create your own statistics, or reintegrate them into the EBP "statistics" tool.
chromium.p3: Take full control of your data and use it your way!
chromium.q1: Can I export another player's games?
chromium.r1:
Yes, you can!
Simply access their public profile URL, go to their "history" page, and start the export via the extension.
chromium.q2: What are "Max pages" and "Time between actions" used for?
chromium.r2:
"Max pages" sets the maximum number of pages that can be exported in a single file.
"Time between actions" determines the wait time (in milliseconds) between each action of the bot.
If the export encounters an issue, try reducing the number of pages or increasing the time between actions.

tuto.intro: Some tools have advanced features, don't hesitate to discover them:
tuto.pc: On PC: By leaving the mouse on a tool button for 1 second.
tuto.mobile: On phone: By pressing a tool button for 1 second.

premium.title: Support "EBP - EVA Battle Plan"
premium.content:
Some features are reserved for members supporting the project.
However, they all remain freely accessible on the "Atlantis" map.
premium.steps: Steps: Develop complex strategic plans, in several phases, to optimize your approach.
premium.video: Video: Convert your strategies into videos to access them from any device.
premium.storage: Database: Save your plans in an encrypted database, ensuring secure and immediate access from anywhere.
premium.immersiveDraw: Immersive drawer: Further clarify your strategies by annotating directly on your immersive views, enabling visual and practical understanding for the entire team!
premium.wallCollisions: Collisions: By analyzing the collision cones, determine the most strategic positions and maximize the effectiveness of your grenades.
premium.team: Team: Share your subscription with the other three members of your team so they can benefit from all the benefits of "support" mode and collaborate on shared plans within the team.
premium.default_text: Calls: Modify community calls, create your own codes to disrupt your opponents.
premium.engine: Engine: Rotate the walls and create complex strategies based on the rotation angle of the map's center.
premium.arrow: Arrow: Easily guide your teammates or mark a point of interest.

iOSFullscreen.title: Full screen on iOS devices
iOSFullscreen.content:
On an iOS device, to use the application in full screen, you must:
1) Click on the button (at the top right on iPad, bottom middle on iPhone).
2) Click on "Add to Home Screen".
3) Click on "Add".
4) Open the created shortcut.

iOSVideo.title: Save as video on iOS devices
iOSVideo.content: You can't save as video on an iOS device.

wait.title: Video export
wait.description: Please wait while your plan is exported to video.
wait.options_description: If you have no issues with video export, leave the settings at their default values.

bug.title: There was a problem with video encoding

I invite you to raise the issue.

Would you like to download the unencoded version? (iPhones and iPads may not be able to read it).

home.title: Home

maintenance.title: Under maintenance
maintenance.description:
EBP is currently under maintenance.
The page will refresh automatically, it should not take more than {{ duration }} minutes...
maintenance.skull_alt: Skull icon of the deployment animation

home.p1:
Take a step ahead of the opposing teams, anticipate all their actions and bypass them.
EBP is a tool allowing you to edit strategies around the maps of the EVA game.
Predict the movements of your opponents, tell your teammates where to stand and how to react to different situations.

dialog.p: Do you find that a feature is missing?

home.p2:
EBP is a labour of love.
It is what it is thanks to tremendous support from the amazing community of users.
home.p3: Check out our Discord for the latest announcements, chats, suggestions and more!

teams.noTeamInfo: The team has not provided any information about her.

alts.android: Download the EBP app from the Play Store

bank.title: Bank
bank.h2: Your plans belong only to you, not to the developer, not to hackers.
bank.p1:
Encryption ensures that no one can access your files, not even me.
Plans, plans names, folder names and more are all fully encrypted, whether during storage or transfer to the secure cloud.
bank.p2:
It is completely normal to encounter problems, even within the most reliable infrastructures.
That's why I make daily backups of all your plans. This means I'm able to restore all of your data when needed, ensuring that your plans are never lost.

cookies.p1: To provide a better website experience, we use cookies to personalize content and to analyze our traffic. Cookies include required cookies, functional cookies ans performance cookies.
cookies.p2: We do not allow third-party companies to collect information about your activity on our websites, for example, through cookies, pixels, and web beacons.
cookies.p3: When you visit any web site, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Please be advised that blocking some types of cookies may directly affect your experience of our site and the services we are able to offer.
cookies.h3: Share or sale of personal data
cookies.p4: EBP does not sell or share your personal information.

supporter.title: Welcome to your EBP event
supporter.description1: This page allows members who do not support EBP to enjoy premium benefits during their event.
supporter.description2: You already support EBP, and for that I thank you warmly!
supporter.description3: I'm counting on you to accompany your friends 😊

step0.description1: Are you attending an EBP-related event?
step0.description2: To ensure you can enjoy the benefits of your event, we will carry out a few checks.

step1.title: Checking your position
step1.description1: Accept the pop-up from your device
step1.description2: Benefits are reserved for members physically present at the event. To ensure the security of this offer, please have your device's location verified.

step2.title: Event code
step2.description2: Ask the organizer who is hosting the event for the 4-digit code.

congratulations.title: Congratulations
congratulations.description1: EBP's premium benefits have been unlocked during the event.
congratulations.description2: Thank you and don't hesitate, if you need anything, I am at your disposal!

meta.description: EBP is a tool allowing you to edit strategies around the maps of the EVA game. Take a step ahead of the opposing teams, anticipate all their actions and bypass them. Predict the movements of your opponents, tell your teammates where to stand and how to react to different situations.
